mapper.sql: id, principal_id, material_id, file_type, file_url, file_identify, created_user, created_date, updated_user, updated_date
mapper.insert: insert into t_bic_material (principal_id, material_id, file_type, file_url, file_identify, created_user, created_date, updated_user, updated_date ) values ( #{principalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileIdentify,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

insert into t_bic_material (principal_id, material_id, file_type, file_url, file_identify, created_user, created_date, updated_user, updated_date ) values
( #{item.principalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.materialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fileIdentify,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update t_bic_material set principal_id = #{principalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_type = #{fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_identify = #{fileIdentify,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_user = #{createdUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_user = #{updatedUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_date = #{updatedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
